Author: Sir Seven#7158
Content:
WebUI works good, no issues with presented functionality.
A few notes/thoughts:

- just opening `http://127.0.0.1:$port/` always opens `To continue, log in to your account.` page. Even if you are logged in.
- will be nice to have help page and/or api decription page
- there is no options to call `stop` from webUI, or I just can't find one :)
- no mempool either
- spending has a nice flow: create prototype -> revize -> create tx -> broadcast, but just broadcast field looks weird on info page. Quite counter-intuitive.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: broadcast field is at the bottom of the page, most people wont even see it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: mempool requests will create a lot of load

Content: Logout is a separarte button on top. shouldn't it be inside Account page?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: just a side effect of not having enough time to get all the kinks out

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there is no stop from GUI

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the memory and CPU usage is quite low

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: anyway the html templates are there, feel free to make PR with improved appearance, help, etc.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: change in control flow will require some changes in the C code

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i had the logout button in the upper right to allow instant logout, in case time is urgent
